ai-ja372:1.3_0: it’s not good to see the ascetic,
ai-ja372:2.3_0: heart from the throne of the heart
ai-ja372:2.4_0: it is not possible to grieve.”
ai-ja372:3.4_0: And the fool, peaceful and strive,
ai-ja372:4.1_0: for anyone who is worshipped by Brahmā,
ai-ja372:4.3_0: all the crooks, together with the Saṅgha,
ai-ja372:5.3_0: like a drilling the head with the wind.
ai-ja372:6.1_0: For you have plucked the dart from me,
ai-ja372:6.2_0: When they’re released from the heart
ai-ja372:6.4_0: in which I once was mired.
ai-ja372:7.2_0: free of greed, free of hate,
